Player used to watch both movies - KMPlayer
appleseed 1
great movie, good print, japanese audio, no audio errors, no video errors either except the end credits are cuttoff after roughly 35 seconds. no spelling errors on srt file and is properly synced.
Runtime - 1:41:49, Resolution - 704x400, FPS - 23.
appleseed 2
great movie, good print, japanese audio, no audio errors, no video errors either except the end credits are cuttoff in this too (after roughly 30 seconds). no spelling errors on eng srt file and is properly synced.
Runtime - 1:40:50, Resolution - 704x400, FPS - 23.
